title: PAYDAY 2 Everything you need so far
description:
This whole package contains all updates so far for PAYDAY 2, as well as the MP Fix v.3 crack, so you can enjoy the game to the maximum.

Updates in this package are the following:

Update 1

Update 2 (with HOTFIX)

Update 3

Update 4

Update 5 (biggest update)

Update 6

Update 7

Update 8

Update 9

Update 10

Update 11 (quite possibly the buggiest of all)

Instructions:

1) Install all updates in their corresponding order (Hotfix is required too after the original Update 2, or all subsequent installations will break the game!)

2) DO NOT put the cracks from the update folders unless it matches your release, otherwise it will break the game

3) After everything is finished, copy the contents from the MP Fix v.3 folder in the PAYDAY 2 folder

4) Play and enjoy!
